TeSS
Class AbstractURLScan

java.lang.Object
  |
  +--TeSS.AbstractURLScan
Direct Known Subclasses:
URLScan
public abstract class AbstractURLScan
extends java.lang.Object

A Site searcher class. When given a site definition it will go out and grab the site and then parse it based on that definition. See the documentation for information about writting site defintions.

          Whether this scan has finished

                       SQLProperties properties)
                throws GeneralTelegraphException
This sets up all the needed info to scan the given site Starts a new scan on this web page with specified search arguments.
Parameters:
urlConfig - Config information about the web page used to parse it
properties - URL properties (name-value pairs)
